title: Diamond team looking for D5+ support
body:
Hi,

My diamond ranked team is looking for a d5+ support. Keep in mind there will be trials. 

Requirements:
1. A solo queue rank of at least diamond 5+
2. A positive attitude
3. A mic 
4. Teamspeak
5. Be online most days.
6. Willingness to improve

In your application please post your
IGN:
Rank:
Champion pool:
Hours available:

Add me in game: 5YearOldGeneral
